name: Neo Horizon
description:
Made in 3 days for the ScoreSpace x Polycade Jam | Theme: THE 80's

Please zoom in if screen is too small and report any bugs to us in the comments!

Q: How do you play this game? What are the controls?

Controls (Keyboard / Controller)

  • Move - "left/right arrow " / "D-Pad / Joystick"
  •  Shoot/Select  - "Space" / "Button A"
  • Cancel/Quit - "Escape" / "Button B"

Q: How does this game relate to the theme ?

A:  After looking at arcade games from the 1980s, we decided to mash up arcades games like Tetris and Arkanoid into one game. The game's aesthetics and sounds were also designed to make players feel like they're playing an arcade game from the 1980s as well.

Q: What is the goal of the game? 

A: Get the highest possible score in both mini-games. In the mini-games, blocks will slowly descend onto you (at the bottom of the screen) and you have to keep destroying them as long as possible. Remember change your nickname otherwise the score will be saved under someone else!
